content.rendered:
• Customer Reviews: 
    4.4 out of 5 stars    4 ratings

excerpt.rendered: Dehydroepiandrosterone or DHEA is a hormone that is naturally found in the body. Men and women both need DHEA dehydroepiandrosterone for a number of important tasks. The hormone: – Supports the activities of the immune system – Helps to keep mood balanced – Promotes healthy aging – Contributes to bone health – Assists with metabolism function – Aids in Healthy weight management – Aids in the development of lean muscle mass – Promotes hormonal balances Increasing the bodys natural supply of pure DHEA may offer health benefits for both men and women. We have formulated our supplement to serve as a source of DHEA for both women and men. The formula is vegetarian friendly, gluten free and completely free of artificial preservatives, colorants and sweeteners.
